extDescription.message: Automatically displays location info for Threads post authors

popupSubtitle.message: View location info from your feed

emptyState.message:
No profiles extracted yet.
Browse Threads to capture profile info.

confirmClear.message: Are you sure you want to clear all cached profiles?

rateLimitWarning.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Too many location queries. Rate limited by Threads. Auto-fetch paused for 1 hour. Other features unaffected

autoQueryTooltip.message: Automatically fetch profile information while browsing Threads

showFlagsTooltip.message: Display country flags next to location names

noLocationStats.message:
No location data yet.
Browse Threads to capture profile locations.

rateLimitPopupHint.message: You can turn off auto-query in extension settings to avoid rate limiting.

loginRequiredWarning.message: üîí Please log in to Threads to use this extension

loginRequiredHint.message: Location info can only be fetched when you're logged in.

loginRequired.message: Login required. Click to learn more.

onboardingSubtitle.message: Automatically discover location info for Threads users

onboardingFeature1.message: Displays location and join date for Threads post authors

onboardingFeature2.message: Automatically fetches profile info as you scroll

onboardingFeature3.message: Highlights new users (joined within 2 months) with a [NEW] badge

onboardingFeature4.message: View location statistics in the popup panel

onboardingControlDesc.message: You can toggle Auto-query on or off at any time by clicking the extension icon in your browser toolbar.

onboardingStep1Desc.message: Find the Lee-Su-Threads icon in your browser's extension toolbar (usually in the top-right corner).

onboardingStep2Desc.message: Use the switch in the popup to enable or disable automatic profile fetching.

onboardingStep3Desc.message: Check out the "Location Stats" tab to see where your feed authors are from!

onboardingStep4Desc.message: Press Ctrl+Shift+, (comma) while on Threads to quickly open settings in a new tab.

onboardingFooter.message: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for the Threads community

customEmojiHint.message: Click to set a custom emoji for this location
